TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EdgeProfile extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of curve to apply to the edge of a bitmap.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following figure illustrates the different values of this enumeration.
![Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile](~/add/media/effects-beveledgeprofile.png "Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile")

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Effects.EdgeProfile BulgedUp = int32(3)

Docs.summary: An edge that curves up and then down, like a ridge.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Effects.EdgeProfile CurvedIn = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A concave edge that curves in.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Effects.EdgeProfile CurvedOut = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A convex edge that curves out.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Effects.EdgeProfile Linear = int32(0)

Docs.summary: An edge that is a straight line.
